Action.Str: [ -e /data/adb/pif.json ] && (echo "deleting old pif.json"; rm /data/adb/pif.json) || echo "pif.json not present, let's continue." > /storage/emulated/0/gms_apk.log 2>&1

sleep 4 && { if pgrep -f com.google.android.gms > /dev/null; then pkill -f com.google.android.gms && echo "com.google.android.gms process killed."; else echo "com.google.android.gms process is not running."; fi; } >> /storage/emulated/0/gms_apk.log 2>&1 && { if pgrep -f com.google.android.gms.unstable > /dev/null; then pkill -f com.google.android.gms.unstable && echo "com.google.android.gms.unstable process killed."; else echo "com.google.android.gms.unstable process is not running, no need to kill."; fi; } >> /storage/emulated/0/gms_apk.log 2>&1
